presentationTable.name: Person Profile - Score Details
presentationTable.description: Provides details of person scores related to skills and qualifications compared to Model Job Profiles

presentationColumns.name: Degree Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Degree Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Degree Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Language Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Language Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Language Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Honours and Awards Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Honours and Awards Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Honours and Awards Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Competency Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Competency Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Competency Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Membership Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Membership Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Membership Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Work Requirements Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Work Requirements Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Work Requirements Match Score

presentationColumns.name: License and Certification Match Score
presentationColumns.description: License and Certification Matching Score of the worker ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.License and Certification Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Total Match Score
presentationColumns.description: Average of all match scores. Total Matching Score of the worker for a job ranging from -1 to 1 with -1 being the lowest match and 1 being the best match.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Total Match Score

presentationColumns.name: Percentile
presentationColumns.description: Provides distribution of the worker in a group that is divided into 100 equal groups based on matching score of the worker.

presentationColumns.name: Skill Gap Score
presentationColumns.description: Skill gap score of the worker ranging from 0 to .75 where 0 indicates very low upskilling required versus .75 being the highest upskilling required.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Dim - HCM - Profile Matching Details.Skill Gap Score
